description: This file defines a CacheWorkflow class that extends a Workflow class, implementing a caching mechanism for responses using an agent and session state. It includes a main block that demonstrates running the workflow and printing responses.

classes.name: CacheWorkflow
classes.description: A workflow class that caches previous outputs to avoid redundant processing.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow, checking cache before invoking the agent, and updates session state with the response.
